partnerDetails.about:
•  Established in 2002

•  Today one of the leaders in technological innovations

•  92  employees

•  Annual turnover > 5 mil €

•  Wide spectre of products and services in different areas of expertise, most of them based on own innovative solutions

Specialized in

•  Management and supervising the use of renewable energy sources (gas, water, etc.)

•  Solution implementation in industrial automation of manufacturing and utility companies

•  Utility infrastructure remote control and management

•  Installation of automatic process control system of steam and hot water boilers in the boiler rooms all across Europe

•  Authorized for installation, measuring and examination of electrical installations and maintenance of Ex-equipment

•  Industry 4.0 compatible assembling of electrical cabinets

•  Official Siemens Sivacon, Schneider Okken, Cubic and Logstrup partner for MCC cabinets and low voltage distribution systems

All activities, products and services are based on ˝Machine to environment˝ concept. M2e is Duplico trademark that presents energy consumption and efficiency control systems.

M2e and optimized energy usage is strategic determinant of Duplico engineering, information systems, energy performance management, facility management, electrical control engineering and industrial maintenance.

In 18 years of practice Duplico implemented over 2000 telemetry systems, automation, remote control and management systems with energy consumption optimization for utility infrastructure.

Within pharmaceutical, chemistry, food and beverage, oil and gas industry Duplico designs and performs electrical works, control and management systems, programming of SCADA software and composing energy control electrical cabinets.

Custom solutions for buildings - installation and maintenance, energy efficiency control and management systems.

In 2018. Duplico invested in infrastructure automatization, optimization and development of electrical cabinets production - Industry 4.0 compatible

Over the years, individually and in association with Faculty of electronics, we developed many innovative solutions implemented in many utility companies and cities of Croatia:

•  System of gas consumption nomination

•  System of leakage detection in water pipes

•  Patented method of safe telemetry data transfer which is implemented in more than 2000 remote control systems all over Croatia

•  ˝Machine to environment˝ trademark

We apply quality, health, safety and environmental protection standards (ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 50001, ISO 27001, OHSAS and SCC) in all our processes and services.
